name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms XIII: Scenario - The Rise of Cao Cao & Event Set
summary: Cao Cao and Lu Bu battled at Zhongyuan, and the defeated Lu Bu was forced to fall back and seek the aid of Liu Bei in Xu. At Jiangdong, Sun Ce expanded his forces with an all-out attack. Meanwhile, as Li Jue, Guo Si, and other remnants of Dong Zhuo's force were disputing one another, Emperor Xian fled from Chang'an and returned to...
